授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to improve their English reading and speaking ability.
到達目標: The students will improve their English ability. Specifically, the students will:1. Read short texts in English.2. Answer questions about the contents of the reading.3. Practice listening to spoken English about the contents.4. Give oral presentations in English.
授業方法: Lecture. Activity. All fourteen classes will be face-to-face format.
